spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is maintained, but window placement on the front facade deviates from the plan. Door swings are mostly correct but some furniture blocks circulation paths.

structural_fidelity.notes: Main walls are correctly aligned. The porch/balcony on the left has been enclosed into a room-like structure contrary to the open plan. Wall thickness is consistent.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is highly accurate to the floor plan symbols. Scale of the kitchen island and dining chairs is slightly undersized compared to the 2D plan proportions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric rendering. Orthographic projection is consistent. Lighting is clear, though internal wall shadows are slightly exaggerated.

detected_errors.description: The balcony/patio on the left is represented as an enclosed hallway/entry room instead of an outdoor space as indicated by the plan lines.
The front windows (bottom right of image) do not match the single large window indicated in the 2D plan; instead, they are split into two smaller units.
Proportion distortion in the kitchen area; the gap between the island and the wall units is larger in the 3D render than the 2D plan's architectural scale.
Hallucination of a solid brown door at the main entrance that does not reflect the double-swing arch style shown on the plan.
